pages.text: Shade stone and cursed metal are great at funneling necrotic energies. With some tinkering and the Rotting Focus, you've managed to create a special gravestone that can summon forth loyal Zombie Servants on demand.

The gravestone requires a Chain to be added, in order to call forth a Zombie Servant. Much like the Spider Nest, right-clicking the nest with a Wand or Staff will make it so that it will only spawn a servant if a valid target is near it.
